Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NZ2114 variant 8 (synthetic AMPs, plectasin analog, 3S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, fungal defensin analog, fungi-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (92.5%) toPlectasin analog NZLC: 15%, G: 18%, K: 10%.Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: 0.748 g/L secreted proteins after 120 h.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 43300 (MIC 64 ug/ml) and S.hyicus ACCC 61734 (MIC 128 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Liu H, Yang N, Teng D, Mao R, Hao Y, Ma X, Wang J.2021
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Mol Sci. 2021 May 21;22(11):5435. doi: 10.3390/ijms22115435.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Design and Pharmacodynamics of Recombinant Fungus Defensin NZL with Improved Activity against Staphylococcus hyicus In Vitro and In Vivo
